class MCPServer:
    """
    Servidor MCP que integra capibara6 con el protocolo MCP
    """
    def __init__(self, host: str = "localhost", port: int = 3000):
        self.host = host
        self.port = port
        self.connector = Capibara6MCPConnector()
        self.request_queue = queue.Queue()
        self.response_queue = queue.Queue()

def send_test():
    print("Enviando email de prueba desde capibara6...\n")
    SMTP_SERVER = os.getenv('SMTP_SERVER')
    SMTP_PORT = int(os.getenv('SMTP_PORT'))
    SMTP_USER = os.getenv('SMTP_USER')
    SMTP_PASSWORD = os.getenv('SMTP_PASSWORD')
    FROM_EMAIL = os.getenv('FROM_EMAIL')
    print(f"Servidor: {SMTP_SERVER}:{SMTP_PORT}")
    print(f"Usuario: {SMTP_USER}")
    print(f"Destino: electrohipy@gmail.com\n")

class Colors:
    GREEN = '\033[92m'
    RED = '\033[91m'
    YELLOW = '\033[93m'
    BLUE = '\033[94m'
    BOLD = '\033[1m'
    END = '\033[0m'
def print_header():
    """Imprimir encabezado del script"""
    print(f"{Colors.BLUE}{Colors.BOLD}")

label: print_header
peekOfCode:
def print_header():
    """Imprimir encabezado del script"""
    print(f"{Colors.BLUE}{Colors.BOLD}")
    print("=" * 60)
    print("ü¶´ CAPIBARA6 - VERIFICADOR DE CONFIGURACI√ìN")
    print("=" * 60)
    print(f"{Colors.END}")
def print_section(title):
    """Imprimir t√≠tulo de secci√≥n"""
    print(f"\n{Colors.BOLD}{Colors.YELLOW}üìã {title}{Colors.END}")

def test_smtp():
    """Probar configuraci√≥n SMTP"""
    print_section("CONFIGURACI√ìN SMTP")
    smtp_server = os.getenv('SMTP_SERVER')
    smtp_port = os.getenv('SMTP_PORT', '587')
    smtp_user = os.getenv('SMTP_USER')
    smtp_password = os.getenv('SMTP_PASSWORD')
    if not all([smtp_server, smtp_user, smtp_password]):
        print("‚ùå Configuraci√≥n SMTP incompleta")
        return False

label: main

def main():
    """Funci√≥n principal"""
    print_header()
    # Verificar que existe el archivo .env
    if not os.path.exists('.env'):
        print(f"{Colors.RED}‚ùå Archivo .env no encontrado{Colors.END}")
        print("üí° Copia .env.example a .env y configura tus claves:")
        print("   cp .env.example .env")
        sys.exit(1)
    print("‚úÖ Archivo .env encontrado")
